00039 class Openssh extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'openssh';
00042     public $Layout= 'sshd';
00043     
00044     function Openssh()
00045     {
00046         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('OpenSSH logs detailed information on all connections, successful logins and failures. Also provided are warnings based on reverse DNS lookups.');
00047         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Thanks to OpenSSH, remote root login to the system is permitted by default. TCP Keep Alive and Use DNS options may help you resolve some issues.');
00048     
00049         $this->Config = array(
00050             'Port' => array(
00051                 'title' => _TITLE2('Port'),
00052                 'info' => _HELPBOX2('The strategy used for options in the default sshd_config shipped with OpenSSH is to specify options with their default value where possible, but leave them commented.  Uncommented options change a default value.'),
